titleStmt.title: An essay for the recording of illustrious providences wherein an account is given of many remarkable and very memorable events which have hapned this last age, especially in New-England / by Increase Mather, teacher of a church at Boston in New-England.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Green for Joseph Browning and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
